name: Button: A Tool for Encouragement
description:
Button isn't so much a game as it's a tool for encouragement, which sometimes, I really need. 

This was a project that I started two days ago with no prior knowledge of Ren'Py. There are things that I could've done better, but honestly, this experience was amazing and I really feel like I learned a lot!

I'm going to be updating this over time, so this project is always going to be evolving.

I hope you enjoy it, even a little bit.
